text: Working Girl is a 1988 American romantic comedy-drama movie starring Melanie Griffith as a Staten Island-raised secretary working in a New York City bank. Also starring are Harrison Ford, Alec Baldwin, and Sigourney Weaver. == Other websites == * Category:1988 comedy-drama movies Category:1988 romantic comedy movies Category:1988 romantic drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Manhattan in fiction Category:Movies directed by Mike Nichols Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies that won the Best Original Song Academy Award Category:Office comedies
title: Working Girl
